description:
Gross margin for goods for resale

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
45341 Annual statistics of wholesale and retail trade

Definition:
The gross margin for goods for resale is calculated as
follows:

Gross margin for goods for resale
= turnover from trade
- purchases of goods for resale
+ stock of goods for resale at the end of the business
year
- stock of goods for resale at the beginning of the
business year


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2017
name: Gross margin for goods for resale
